ygData.subject: Re: Not really Bard specific
ygData.msgSnippet: That s interesting. I don t know who anyone actually is, or whether someone that says they are a musician truely is, for that matter. I ve noted however that
ygData.messageBody:
That's interesting. I don't know who anyone actually is, or whether someone that
says they are a musician truely is, for that matter.

I've noted however that John Kim has an exceptional understanding of game
mechaincs and does alot of testing and what not, always backing up his
statements with viable data. His detailed explanation sounds very logical to me,
so if there is to be another side of the argument, I would like to see it
supported by something more than "I say I work for Verant". No offense intended
to J.M. or any other posters btw, I just like to know WHY something works, and
not merely that it does or doesn't work.

Aruell, Karana


> Umm, John? Since J.M. works for Verant and is the bard developer, I think I
> will go with his explanation over yours. <g>
>
> Paralto of Povar
